OOC: I assume they are at or very near the special cell.
   
  ::Lord Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus fress Nightlight of her shackles and has her signature scanned via her hand by the computer panel.
   
  Jhiaxus: Will that do it?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Perceptor:

"Open!" Commanded Pereptor. The door opened and showed Nightlight 
trying stood up. The room was tiny and designed in that way that the 
prisioner couldnt hide. It were a bench and a tiny desk as funiture.

It was bad iluminated. 

"Come!!" Commanded Perceptor and Nightlight obeyed, looking to Jhiaxus 
Perceptor said "you have to freed her hands and place one in a scanner 
that is close the door, after that she can enjoy her new room"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus: You mean this isn't the right cell? Well open it up. We'll 
fix it.
> 
>



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
